casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Robert THOMPSON, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158551
COA: 343807 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 29, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 10, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because the defendant's motion for relief from judgment is prohibited by MCR 6.502(G). The motion to hold this case in abeyance is DENIED.
